name: Chestnuts & Brown Sugar - La Petite Fireplace™ Soy Wood Wick Candle 13oz
description:
A delicious mixture of caramel and rich maple combined with chestnuts in a buttery cream base. This fragrance is a real winner! Very strong and rich with the soothing sound of crackling wood to the candle burning experience. 

SIZE: 13 oz STYLE: Morgan Jar  
BURN TIME: 96-102 hours  
WEIGHT: 1.65 lbs

name: Blue Spruce - La Petite Fireplace™ Soy Wood Wick Candle 13oz
description:
Inhale this Colorado Rocky Mountain high scent! This very rich fragrance smells exactly like the stunning Blue Spruce Fir tree a popular choice as a Christmas tree. A fresh, revitalizing and absolutely enchanting aroma! Wood Wick soy candles add the soothing sound of crackling wood to the candle burning experience. 

SIZE: 13 oz STYLE: Morgan Jar 
BURN TIME: 96-102 hours 
WEIGHT: 1.65 lbs

name: Victorian Christmas - La Petite Fireplace™ Soy Wood Wick Candle 13oz
description:
A Christmas potpourri with a Victorian feel. The fragrance captures a blend of florals with a hint of citrus. A most pleasing aroma! Soy wood wick candles add the soothing sound of crackling wood to the candle burning experience. 

SIZE: 13 oz STYLE: Morgan Jar 
BURN TIME: 96-102 hours 
WEIGHT: 1.65 lbs

name: Oh Christmas Tree - La Petite Fireplace™ Soy Wood Wick Candle 13oz
description:
Experience the magic of Christmas! A superb and powerful evergreen blend that smells of a brisk winter forest. The BEST Christmas tree scent ever! A most popular holiday fragrance! Wood Wick soy candles add the soothing sound of crackling wood to the candle burning experience. 

SIZE: 13 oz STYLE: Morgan Jar 
BURN TIME: 96-102 hours 
WEIGHT: 1.65 lbs

name: Dickens Christmas - La Petite Fireplace™ Soy Wood Wick Candle 13oz
description: A winning combination of fresh fruits on a spicy bouquet of cinnamon, clove, nutmeg and juniper. Relive Christmas memories with this fantastic holiday fragrance. The soothing sound of crackling wood add to the candle burning experience
